divs: Sighting DetailsAt the approximate time and date stated above, I awoke to what first appeared to be a car pulling into the driveway of the stated residence. It looked as if headlights were coming through the window. The light quickly grew in intensity and as I began to try to sit up to investigate, an incredibly bright, white light with a light bluish hue shown into the room. At the same time I felt a high-frequency vibration inside of my body preventing my movement. What I felt was complete paralysis. An overwhelming fear came over me, and I tried to scream, and was unable to. As soon as I tried to scream for help, I felt my body being levitated and I could see the ceiling getting closer. When I was just a few inches away from the ceiling I heard what sounded like my own voice talking to me. (What my voice sounds like from my perspective, not like a recording). The first words that I understood were such that I should not be afraid because no harm would come to me. What happens from here forward is sort of fuzzy and I cannot recall absolute detail except for the following: As the encounter ended, I saw the ceiling getting further away and I felt myself sink back into bed. All at once, the vibration and bright light stopped. I checked the clock and it said something like 2:40. I was not able to view the clock prior to the encounter, but it seemed as though ten minutes had elapsed from start to finish. The next morning I told my parents of the incident, who of course did not believe my statement. I have only told very few people about this encounter since it happened.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Harpswell
This sighting has never been favorited.
